name: loocam
0:
”Alexa, turn on the smart socket”
”Alexa, turn off the smart socket”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Loocam skill for Amazon Alexa intelligently controls the socket switch through voice - Make your home smarter, intelligently manage household appliances, must-have smart sockets and apps, relax smart life.

Application download: Check the Loocam and "Alexa" applications in the App Store or Apple Store to download and install them.

Easy to install and configure
- Works with the Loocam app
Step 1: Register or log into the Loocam app;
Step 2: Power on the smart socket;
Step 3: Add a smart socket to the app and configure the network;
(Note: Smart Outlet works with existing home Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz band), no separate hub required)
- Setup with "Alexa" app
Step 4: Register or log into the "Alexa" app
Step 5: Click to enable Loocam skills, and then enter the account username and password in step 1 on the link page
Step 6: Search smart socket and configure smart socket information
(Note: Please note that setting the "Alexa" device login account should be consistent with the login account in step 4)

easy to control
When using the Loocam smart socket control skill, you can control the smart socket switch through "Alexa" voice commands. For example, you can say:
"Alexa, turn on the smart outlet"
"Alexa, turn off smart outlet"

schedule
You can use the Loocam app to create a schedule of connected electronics based on your daily and weekly routines.
Scheduling also helps keep your electricity bills down.

technical specifications
Model: LNA-MKE1-WN-S
Input: 110V-220V/50hz-60hz
Output: 10AMax
Maximum power: 2200W
Overload protection: support
Communication mode: 802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz, Bluetooth V4.0
Working temperature: 0-40C
Working humidity: ≤90%RH without condensation
Protection class: IP54
